name: Amazon Basics Digital Postal Scale, Heavy Duty Weighing Platform for Packages, Shipping, 660 lb Capacity, 1 Ounce Readability, Portable, Black
short_description: Digital shipping postal scale for weighing items; heavy duty yet lightweight, portable design
Includes a postal scale and an AC adapter; durable black ABS with an aluminum anti-skid platform
660 pound (300kg) capacity reads to 0.11 pound/50g/2 ounce in 0.1 ounce increments; minimum load weight is 6 ounces (150g)
Measuring units in kg, ounces, and pounds
Additional separated large back-lit LCD display allows for reading the weighing data from a distance of up to 2m
Tare function for resetting the scale to zero after setting a container on the platform; great for net weights
Powered by 2 x AAA batteries, USB cable, or AC adapter; 5 minute auto shutoff when battery powered; stays on when plugged in; note: data cannot be transferred through USB cable
Product dimensions: 11.81 x 11.81 x 1.38 inches (LxWxH)

short_description: Accurate Measurement with Large Capacity: The range of this new shipping scale is 0.2 lb to 660 lb. Wide measurement range and high precision sensors meet weighing requirements from small parcel to heavy package. Hold And Tare: Hold function allows locking the number on the screen to read the display even after taking the package off the scale. Tare button can zero out the weight of the container for the accurate result of net weight

Wide Application: Suitable for post office, commercial use, warehouse, small business, also good for home. Please put the scale on the hard and flat ground to ensure accurate measurement, take out the screen tucked under the back of the scale before weighing. LO indicates low battery; ERR indicates overload

name: Tree LBS 300 Bench Scale, 300 lb x 0.05 lb Capacity, 18" x 24" Stainless Steel Platform, Single-Point Load Cell. High Accuracy & for Bulk Weighing
short_description: The Tree LBS 300 offers a substantial 300 lb capacity with a fine readability of 0.05 lb, making it ideal for accurately weighing heavy items in various industrial and commercial settings.

Featuring a robust 18" x 24" stainless steel platform and a sturdy steel frame, the scale is designed to withstand heavy-duty usage. The stainless steel platform ensures easy cleanup, making it suitable for environments where hygiene is essential.

The scale is equipped with a backlit LCD display that provides clear and easy-to-read measurements. Its simple keypad functions allow for quick setup and operation, making it convenient for use in both indoor and outdoor environments.

The Tree LBS 300 can be powered using the included AC adapter or the rechargeable battery, providing flexibility for both stationary and portable use. Additionally, it includes an RS232 interface, facilitating data communication with computers or printers for efficient record-keeping.

UNRIVALED CUSTOMER SERVICE: All new Tree products come with 2-year manufacturer warranty and real USA customer support. All our products include industry-leading quality materials. You can be rest assured that you will be given the ultimate Tree Brand experience.

name: VEVOR Computing Digital Platform Scale, 660 lbs Load, 0.1 lbs Accuracy Computing Floor Scale with LB/KG, Tare, Price Calculator, Stainless Steel High-Definition Display for Boxes, Luggages, FCC Listed
short_description: Ultimate Accuracy: Are you ready for complete accuracy! VEVOR's digital computing platform scale offers an extensive weighing range from 0.2 lbs (100 g) to 660 lbs (300 kg) with high accuracy of only 0.1 lbs (50 g). It's a versatile scale suitable for various applications, including industries, courier companies, markets, and even home use.

Multi-functional LED Screen: Our 16'' x 20'' platform scale comes with several functions, including net weighing, recalculating, counting, and valuing. It's incredibly easy to use with just one button to start weighing, and the high-definition LED screen ensures clear and accurate readings. Plus, you can easily switch between kg and lb units for convenient reading.

AC/DC Power Supply: Our computing floor scale is designed for maximum efficiency with both a power adapter and rechargeable batteries. This dual-power system ensures uninterrupted use, even in the event of a power failure. Enjoy long-term use without worrying about running out of power.

A Frame that Lasts: The large platform is constructed of durable carbon steel, making it is non-deformed and rust-proof. The screen is made of stainless steel, ensuring years of use without worrying about damage from bumps. You can trust this scale to last.

90° Foldable & Adjustable Feet: The commercial weight scale features a 90° folding design, making it a great space-saver that can be conveniently stored under shelves or by the wall. Its 4 feet can be adjusted to fit different surfaces, ensuring accurate measurements every time.
